name: Danger Room (itch)
description:
This is a small game created by my team for a game jam. The project's aim is to make an escape room with 5 puzzles. There is one level.

Scientists have a placed a robot in a room to test the limits of artificial intelligence.

How long will it take you to escape the danger room?

----

Don't use the DangerRoomWeb on Chrome.

Chrome doesn't support Unity WebGL
